result.execSummary:
The defendant Jennifer SMITH was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Pay restitution to Manitowoc City Police Department

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Have no contact with Janice and Brian Short, her apology letter can be forwarded.  

Submit DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jennifer SMITH

records.addlTxt: $95.00 of cash bail mailed to MTPD by CR 3 for restitution.

Order Amending Bond.
It is hereby ordered the defendant's daily reporting to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department is no longer required and her bonds are amended accordingly.  All other conditions of her bond in the above pending matters remain in full force and effect.
Copy to jail.

NO CONTEST plea entered to the charge.  Convicted.
Sentencing is set for 11-17-15 at 11:15 a.m.

Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the DA set for 09-29-15 at 2:00 p.m.   
Minutes.

Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Preliminary hearing on 15 CF 448 and 15 CF 449 set for 09-02-15 at 1:30 p.m.    
Minutes.

Defendant in custody on arrest warrant. 
The matter is continued for initial appearance on 08-31-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $150.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and defendant must maintain absolute sobriety - no alcohol, no drugs.   Bail furnished.
